name: Form The Shape - fit in the wall
name_original: Form The Shape - fit in the wall
description:
Your goal is to form a shape which can fit inside the moving wall. To form the shape, you have to tap on the cubes to destroy them. If you can't form the ideal shape in time, then the game is over.

Game features:
• Two game modes: endless and stages
• One finger control.
• Various size walls
• Various shapes
• 60+ stages
• Simple and easy to play
• Different background color themes
